sac.examples.tsp

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • sac.examples.tsp.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Map of places in a TSP problem.
    Author:
    Przemysław Klęsk (wi.zut.edu.pl), Marcin Korzeń (wi.zut.edu.pl)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Map(int n)
      Creates a new map with random places within a unit square.
      Map(java.util.List<Place> listOfPlaces)
      Creates a new map with the given list of places.
      Map(java.lang.String filepath)
      Creates a new map from a text file (where places are written in successive lines, and coordinates are comma separated).
